trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for classes that contain HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> classe est une classe abstraite qui contient les mêmes membres que la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> class enables you to create derived classes that are like the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> classe vous permet de créer des classes dérivées qui sont comme les <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> de classe, mais que vous pouvez personnaliser et qui fonctionnent à l’extérieur du pipeline ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous effectuez des tests unitaires, vous utilisez en général une classe dérivée pour implémenter des membres avec un comportement personnalisé qui correspond au scénario que vous testez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> dérive de la classe <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> class serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> classe qui sert de wrapper pour la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classe.

trans-unit.source: At run time, you typically use an instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> class to call members on the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Au moment de l’exécution, vous utilisez une instance de la <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> pour appeler les membres de classe le <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> objet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
When implemented in a derived class, accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
The user function.
When implemented in a derived class, accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request using the specified user function.
The user function.
The options object.
When implemented in a derived class, accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request using the specified user function and options object.
The exception to add to the exception collection.
When overridden in a derived class, adds an exception to the exception collection for the current HTTP request.
Always.
The HTTP context object.
When implemented in a derived class, raises a virtual event that occurs when the HTTP part of the request is ending.
The subscription token.
This event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection begins.
trans-unit.target: Cet événement se produit avant le <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connexion commence.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of errors (if any) that accumulated when an HTTP request was being processed.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> objects for the current HTTP request, or <see langword="null" /> if no errors accumulated during the HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: Tableau d’objets <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> pour la requête HTTP actuelle, ou <see langword="null" /> si des erreurs ne sont pas accumulées pendant le traitement de la requête HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.
<see langword="false" /> if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> si ASP.NET lève une exception lorsque l'API asynchrone est utilisée alors qu'elle ne devrait pas l'être ; sinon, <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllowAsyncDuringSyncStages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations, consultez <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllowAsyncDuringSyncStages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplicationState" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The application state object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet d’état de l’application pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets an object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
An object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui contient les indicateurs qui concernent le mode de pré chargement asynchrone.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object for the current application domain.
The cache for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Cache pour le domaine d’application actuel.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, clears all errors for the current HTTP request.
Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that represents the handler that is currently executing.
An object that represents the currently executing handler.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui représente le gestionnaire en cours d’exécution.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> value that indicates the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> event that is currently processing.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs de <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.
The object whose <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method must be called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection part of the request is completed.

When implemented in a derived class, enables an object's <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method to be called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection part of this request is completed.
The subscription token.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the first error (if any) that accumulated when an HTTP request was being processed.
The first exception for the current HTTP request/response process, or <see langword="null" /> if no errors accumulated during the HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: Première exception pour le processus de requête/réponse HTTP actuel ou <see langword="null" /> si aucune erreur n’a été accumulée pendant le traitement de la requête HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets an application-level resource.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.

When overridden in a derived class, gets an application-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties.
The requested application-level resource object, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
Always.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object of the requested resource.

When overridden in a derived class, gets an application-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties, and on the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object.
The requested application-level resource object, which is localized for the specified culture, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a page-level resource.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> property of the local resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.

When overridden in a derived class, gets a page-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties.
The requested page-level resource object, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
Always.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> property of the local resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object of the requested resource object.

When overridden in a derived class, gets a page-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties, and on the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object.
The requested local resource object, which is localized for the specified culture, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
Always.
The configuration section path (in XPath format) and the configuration element name.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the specified configuration section of the current application's default configuration.
The specified section, or <see langword="null" /> if the section does not exist.
Always.
The type of service object to get.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an object for the current service type.
The current service type, or <see langword="null" /> if no service is found.
Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that is responsible for processing the HTTP request.
The object that is responsible for processing the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet chargé de traiter la requête HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether custom errors are enabled for the current HTTP request.
<see langword="true" /> if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si les erreurs personnalisées sont activées ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the current HTTP request is in debug mode.
<see langword="true" /> if the request is in debug mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la requête est en mode débogage ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> event has finished processing.
<see langword="true" /> if the event has finished processing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si l’événement a terminé le traitement ; dans le cas contraire, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the request is an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection request.
<see langword="true" /> if the request is an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la requête est une requête <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the connection is upgrading from an HTTP connection to an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection.
<see langword="true" /> if the connection is upgrading; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la connexion est mise à niveau ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a key/value collection that can be used to organize and share data between a module and a handler during an HTTP request.
A key/value collection that provides access to an individual value in the collection by using a specified key.
trans-unit.target: Collection de clés/valeurs qui fournit un accès à une valeur individuelle de la collection au moyen d’une clé spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When implemented in a derived class, gets a reference to the page-instrumentation service instance for this request.
The page-instrumentation service instance for this request.
trans-unit.target: Instance du service d'instrumentation de page pour cette requête.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object for the parent handler.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that represents the parent handler, or <see langword="null" /> if no parent handler was found.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> objet qui représente le gestionnaire parent, ou <see langword="null" /> si aucun gestionnaire parent a été trouvé.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase" /> object for the current user profile.

If the profile properties are defined in the application configuration file and profiles are enabled for the application, an object that represents the current user profile; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si les propriétés de profil sont définies dans le fichier de configuration d’application et profils sont activés pour l’application, un objet qui représente le profil utilisateur actuel ; dans le cas contraire, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.
The object that should process the request.
When overridden in a derived class, specifies a handler for the request.
If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request.
trans-unit.target: Si vous définissez `handler` à `null`, le gestionnaire par défaut est utilisé pour traiter la demande.

trans-unit.source: You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez définir `handler` soit un gestionnaire asynchrone ou d’un gestionnaire synchrone.

trans-unit.source: The handler must implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Le gestionnaire doit implémenter le <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.

trans-unit.source: A derived type fails to implement this method.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> object for the current HTTP response.
The current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Réponse HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, assigns an internal rewrite path, which lets the request URL differ from the internal path of the resource.
The replacement path.
When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path.
Always.
The replacement path.
<see langword="true" /> to reset the virtual path; <see langword="false" /> to keep the virtual path unchanged.
When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path and a value that specifies whether the virtual path for server resources is modified.
Always.
The replacement path.
Additional path information for a resource.
The request query string.
When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path, path information, and query string information.
Always.
The replacement path.
Additional path information for a resource.
The request query string.
<see langword="true" /> to set the file path used for client resources to the value of the <c>filePath</c> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path, path information, query string information, and a value that specifies whether the client file path is set to the rewrite path.
Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpServerUtility" /> object that provides methods that are used when Web requests are being processed.
The server utility object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet utilitaire de serveur pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The session-state object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet d’état de session pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
One of the enumeration values that specifies what type of session state behavior is required.
When overridden in a derived class, sets the type of session state behavior that is required to support an HTTP request.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method provides a base method that must be implemented by classes that inherit from this type.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> méthode fournit une méthode de base qui doit être implémentée par les classes qui héritent de ce type.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET implements this method in the <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET implémente cette méthode dans le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> et <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classes.

trans-unit.source: A derived type fails to implement this method.

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> object should skip the authorization check for the current request.
<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> should skip the authorization check; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si le <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> doit ignorer le contrôle d'autorisation ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Always.

When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets a value that specifies whether the ASP.NET runtime should call <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> on the thread that is servicing this request when the request times out.
<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> will be called when the thread times out; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> est appelé lorsque le thread expire ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ThreadAbortOnTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations, consultez <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ThreadAbortOnTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the initial timestamp of the current HTTP request.
The timestamp of the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Horodatage de la requête HTTP active.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.TraceContext" /> object for the current HTTP response.
The trace object for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Objet de trace pour la réponse HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets security information for the current HTTP request.
An object that contains security information for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui contient les informations de sécurité pour la requête HTTP active.

trans-unit.source: Always.
When implemented in a derived class, gets the negotiated protocol that was sent from the server to the client for an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection.
The negotiated protocol.
trans-unit.target: Protocole négocié.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets the ordered list of protocols that were requested by the client.
The requested protocols, or <see langword="null" /> if this is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request or if no list is present.
trans-unit.target: Protocoles demandés, ou <see langword="null" /> s'il ne s'agit pas d'une requête <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> ou si aucune liste n'est présente.
